# ARCamera.TrackingState

**Enumeration**

Values for position tracking quality, with possible causes when tracking quality is limited.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum TrackingState
```

## Determining the camera tracking status

- **ARCamera.TrackingState.notAvailable**: Camera position tracking is not available.
- **ARCamera.TrackingState.limited(_:)**: Tracking is available, but the quality of results is questionable.
- **ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason**: Causes of limited position-tracking quality.
- **ARCamera.TrackingState.normal**: Camera position tracking is providing optimal results.

## Handling Tracking Status

- **trackingState**: The general quality of position tracking available when the camera captured a frame.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
